page.title: 12INDUSTRY
page.content: There are 4 main industries in this area. {FARMING}in the area is mostly dairy but some farms have beef cattle.The land is mostly grassland but there are some cereal crops.Most farms are small but there is 1 large dairy farm. {TOURISM }A lot of tourists come to the area but nearly all of them come to see Morwellham. {FORESTRY} There are mostly conifers in the forest but deciduous trees as well.Tavistock Woodlands cut them down for timber to make gates,fencing and tables. {SAUSAGE SKINS}There is a small sausage skin making factory at Shillamill on the back road to Tavistock.The skins are made out of the intestines of sheep and pigs.
